name: Ed's world story
description:
Protagonist 'Ed' lives in Kakariko village. He wants to become an adventurer who explore this great world. You can join Ed's adventure... find out a secret of the world.
It is a side scrolling action game in which you manipulate the main character, [Ed], and explore the world.
Defeat enemies by combining various skills and items!
[Ed] grows through battle, and you can acquire gold by exchanging loot from monsters.
You can purchase items that [Ed] can use by paying gold to NPCs or merchants in town.
You can press the ESC button to open the menu and select previously learned skills.
It has a linear story with different endings depending on conditions.
